data.text: Guatemalan health authorities said over one million doses of Russia’s Sputnik COVID-19 vaccine have expired because there was a “rejection” of the vaccine among the population.

The Pfizer/ BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine has been shown to be just 12 percent effective in children ages five to 11 one month after full vaccination, according to new data from the New York State Department of Health.
The White House announced Monday that fully vaccinated people would no longer have to wear face coverings in the building, effective immediately.
Ontario, Canada has lifted its proof-of-vaccination requirements for all settings, as well as pandemic related capacity limits on  all indoor venues.
